text: Jaba unitira aghi ra pachibata sandestaharu a'e ki timile allaha baheka kasaiko puja nagara, taba uniharule bhanna thale ki yadi hamro palanakartale caheko bha'e, pharistaharula'i (svargadutaharula'i) avatarita gardathyo, tasartha juna kura timila'i di'i'era patha'iyo, hamile tyasala'i mandainaum
